item.g:title: Xiaomi Smart Camera C301 | 3MP with 2K Image Quality | MJA1 Security Chip | Voice Control | 8GB to 256GB microSD Supported | Cloud Storage
item.g:description: Highlights2K image quality, more reliable home protectionPhysical lens shielding protecting privacy at the sourceMJA1 security chip, finance-grade data protectionFully encrypted data transmission, AES-128 encryption for cloud data, and customisable sleep time. With 3MP and a resolution of 2304×1296, the camera displays 2K imagesLarge aperture and 4P lens delivering more vivid images360° Horizontal view 107° Vertical viewReal-time two-way voice callsLarge-diameter speaker for clear remote callsFull colour night vision for longer colour image timeEnhanced infrared night vision for clear images on dark nightsHuman detection and active alertOverviewPhysical lens shielding, protecting privacy at the source The camera lens can be hidden upwards into the body for physical shielding, ensuring security and peace of mind MJA1 security chip, finance-grade data protection Each chip has a unique key and credential, effectively ensuring data communication and storage security, and providing reassuring finance-grade protection. Fully encrypted to protect your privacy Fully encrypted data transmission, AES-128 encryption for cloud data, and customisable sleep time. 3MP ultra-clear visual experience With 3MP and a resolution of 2304x1296, the camera displays 2K images, providing more subtle details and more realistic visuals. Large aperture and 4P lens, delivering more vivid images Featuring a large aperture and 4P lens, the camera effectively reduces light refraction, delivering clear and crisp image quality that provides a transparent and lifelike viewing experience. Dual gimbals for flexible rotation, worry-free large viewing angle The dual-axis pan-tilt-zoom motor enables you to control the camera’s lens with your smartphone, allowing it to rotate in any direction—up, down, left, or right—for a wider viewing angle and a more secure viewing experience. Real-time two-way voice calls, remote communication with family Real-time two-way voice calls and a 5-meter sound pickup range allow you to chat with family anytime, anywhere. Large-diameter speaker for clear remote calls Using an embedded large-diameter speaker with a separate sound cavity and a microphone featuring intelligent noise cancellation, the camera provides a loud and clear voice during your remote calls with your family. Full colour night vision for longer colour image time With the assistance of the built-in high-sensitivity image sensor, the camera can better adapt to low-light environments and retain colour images for a long period of time. Enhanced infrared night vision for clear images on dark nights The camera has six built-in infrared illuminators and can capture clear images even on dark nights without producing red light or disturbing your family's sleep. Human detection and active alert The camera supports local AI-based human detection to detect humans more accurately and quickly without on-cloud processing. When someone is detected, the camera automatically sends an alert to your smartphone Easy to view Slide through the timeline to easily find and view videos. Voice control Work with Alexa or Google Assistant Support for flat and inverted mounting, suitable for multiple scenarios Thoughtful design for a seamless user experience Two storage options, choose as you like H. 265 encoding technology Save storage space and bandwidth with smooth video playbackSpecificationsColour Name WhiteCamera Resolution 3 MPModel Number BHR8683GL | MBC23 | C301Model Name Xiaomi Smart Camera C301Item Quantity 1

Human detection supported Automatic notification when someone approaches The camera uses a next-generation local AI human-detection algorithm to detect humans more accurately and faster, no cloud needed. When someone is detected and locked on to, it automatically tracks and records videos of the person as they move and sends notifications to your smartphone. item.g:title: HUAWEI WATCH FIT 2 Active Edition Smartwatch With 1.74"FullView Display Durable Battery Life Automatic SpO2 Monitoring Midnight Black
item.g:description: HighlightsThe ambient light display allows automatic adjustment of brightness on the watch suited to your environmentTrack all stages of sleep every night and keep a tab on your sleep health with the sleep monitoring feature on the watchSports friendly it is splash and sweat resistance makes it the perfect fitness companion to haveKeep a track of your well being and health right from your wrist with noise health suite featuring a variety of health featuresMonitor your heart rate and blood oxygen levels on the go with the heart rate and spo2 monitor and it also comes with guided breathing to help you relax and embrace mindfulnessOverviewA smartwatch is a wearable computer in the form of a watch; modern smartwatches provide a local touchscreen interface for daily use, while an associated smartphone app provides for management and telemetry (such as long-term biomonitoring). While early models could perform basic tasks, such as calculations, digital time telling, translations, and game-playing, smartwatches released since 2015 or later have more general functionality closer to smartphones, including mobile apps, a mobile operating system and wifi/bluetooth connectivity. Some smartwatches function as portable media players, with fm radio and playback of digital audio and video files via a bluetooth headset. Some models, called watch phones (or vice versa), have mobile cellular functionality like making calls. while internal hardware varies, most have an electronic visual display, either backlit lcd or oled. some use transflective or electronic paper, to consume less power. They are generally powered by a rechargeable lithium-ion battery. Peripheral devices may include digital cameras, thermometers, accelerometers, pedometers, heart rate monitors, altimeters, barometers, compasses, gps receivers, tiny speakers, and microsd cards, which are recognized as storage devices by many other kinds of computers. software may include digital maps, schedulers and personal organizers, calculators, and various kinds of watch faces. The watch may communicate with external devices such as sensors, wireless headsets, or a heads-up display. Like other computers, a smartwatch may collect information from internal or external sensors and it may control, or retrieve data from, other instruments or computers. It may support wireless technologies such as bluetooth, wi-fi, and gps. For many purposes, a "watch computer" serves as a front end for a remote system such as a smartphone, communicating with the smartphone using various wireless technologies. Smartwatches are advancing, especially their design, battery capacity, and health-related applications. health-related applications include applications measuring heart rate, spo2, workout, etc. SpecificationsCharging Type Lightning to USBMaterial FluoroelastomerBattery Size None NoneProduct Weight 30 gColour Name Midnight BlackConnection Type BluetoothWhat's In The Box Watch x 1 Charging Cradle (including the charging cable) x 1 Quick Start Guide & Safety Information & Warranty Card x 1Band Size One Size (Adjustable Band)Dial Material MetalTrending Huawei Watch FitProduct Length 46 mmProduct Height 10. 8 mmProduct Width/Depth 33. 5 mmSmartwatch Dial Size 1. 74 inFeatures Indicator Lights, Rechargeable, Pocket Size, Water Resistant, Sweat ResistantModel Number YDA-B09SModel Name Watch Fit 2 Active EditionItem Quantity 1
